  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException, VacuumException, SpriteException
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - When there is a problem opening the configuration file
      LevelException - When there is a level exception/problem.
      VacuumException - When there is an exception/problem with the vacuum cleaner.
      SpriteException - When there is a Sprite exception/problem.

    • update

      private void update() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, LevelException, VacuumException, SpriteException

      SpriteException
